abstract: There are some classical decision rules such as dominance, maximin and maximum which are still fit for the MADM environment. They do not require the DMâ€™s preference information, and accordingly yield the objective (vs. subjective) solution. However, the right selection of these methods for the right situation is important. (See Table 1.3 for references).
meta: In book: Multiple Attribute Decision Making (pp.58-191)
